item.description:
Thursday, January 3, 2013
8:00 - 9:00 pm EST
Register at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=r&i=513


Whether you are a brand new student, or have been with me for years, I hope you know how committed I am to your success. But one thing puzzles me ... why some students have massive success ... and others never get started.


On this Thursday, I will be interviewing my good friend Linda Baumgarten of the CT REIA and The Ultimate Life Company. Over the past 9 years, she has gotten up close and personal to real estate investing trainers and speakers.


And she has discovered the Behind-the-Curtains secret that all your favorite teachers know... but they haven't shared with you. In fact, Linda says they may be mad when she reveals this Key to you.


So on Thursday, she will be pulling back the curtains ... not only TELLING you but SHOWING you.


Have you been struggling to get your business off the ground?


Perhaps you've had a modicum of success but just can't get any momentum.


Maybe you've bought every course (including mine!) under the sun but you still can't make any money!


Join me on Thursday January 3rd at 8:00 pm EST for a short 45 minute burst of inspiration!


You will discover
* The Reason Some Make it & Others Don't.... and How to Insure You Will
* The Critical ... Really Critical ... Factor to Success in Real Estate
* The Behind-The-Curtain Secret that all the Biggest Real Estate Investing Trainers Use ... but Haven't Shared With You .... Until NOW
* How You Can Immediately Apply this to your Real Estate Business Right Now (even on the call)
* How You Can Transfer this to Any Other Business ... or Any Area of Your Life ... even Health, Physical Fitness, Family
* The Simple 7 Step Formula to Bust Through ANY Challenge ... even if you are young/old, rich/frustrated, hitting your goals or missing them by a mile, totally psyched or on the edge of giving up ... this will change your life.
* Case Studies of Real Estate Investors who Have Succeeded By Applying this Formula


Please note, I'm not going to be promising you great riches in 5 minutes or any of that craziness on this webinar. But this call can change your life ... right on the call.


Unmissable! See you there!!


Alan Cowgill


Register at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=r&i=513

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: Free Webinar - Discover the "Behind-the-Curtain" Secret to Success
